original_text:
Your words have upheld him who was stumbling,
    and you have made firm the feeble knees.
korean_text: 넘어지는 자를 말로 붙들어 주었고 무릎이 약한 자를 강하게 하였거늘

sentences.original_text: Your words have upheld him who was stumbling
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 말씀은 비틀거리는 그를 붙들어 주었습니다.

sentences.original_text: and you have made firm the feeble knees
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 당신은 약한 무릎을 굳게 하였습니다.
